mapper.select: SELECT s1.id, s1.doctor_id, s1.hospital_id, s2.hospital_name, s1.department_id, s3.second_department_name FROM sec_doctor_multipoint s1, sec_hospital s2, sec_second_department s3 WHERE s1.hospital_id = s2.id AND s1.department_id = s3.id AND s1.doctor_id = #{id}
select s1.id,s1.doctor_id,s2.`name`,s1.assistant_id from sec_doctor_assistant s1,sec_doctor s2 where s1.assistant_id = s2.id and s1.doctor_id =#{id}
SELECT s1.*, s2.pic_path,s2.id as pid,s2.pic_path FROM sec_doctor s1 LEFT JOIN sec_pic s2 ON s1.id = s2.obj_id WHERE s1.id =#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_doctor ( id, STATUS, disabled, createtime, NAME, assistant, display, tel, rank, visitplaces, visitaddress, introduce, adeptat, onlineconsultant, IsPremium, price, creator ) VALUES ( #{id}, 1, 0, now(), #{name}, #{assistant}, #{display}, #{tel}, #{rank}, #{visitplaces}, #{visitaddress}, #{introduce}, #{adeptat}, #{onlineconsultant}, #{ispremium}, #{price}, #{creator} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id=#{id}, STATUS =1, disabled=0, createtime=now(), name=#{name}, assistant=#{assistant}, display=#{display}, tel=#{tel}, rank=#{rank}, visitplaces=#{visitplaces}, visitaddress=#{visitaddress}, introduce=#{introduce}, adeptat=#{adeptat}, onlineconsultant=#{onlineconsultant}, IsPremium=#{ispremium}, price=#{price}, creator=#{creator}
mapper.select: select distinct c2.hospital_address from sec_doctor_multipoint c1,sec_hospital c2 where c1.hospital_id = c2.id and c1.doctor_id =#{id}
select id,hospital_name from sec_hospital where id!=#{hospitalId}
